Package com.osoc6.OSOC6

Class TestFunctionProvider<T,I extends Serializable,R extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<T,I>>

java.lang.Object
com.osoc6.OSOC6.BaseTestPerformer<T,I,R>
com.osoc6.OSOC6.TestFunctionProvider<T,I,R>
Type Parameters:
T - the entity of the repository using this class
I - the id type of the entity
R - the repository linked to the entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminEndpointTest, AuthenticationTest, CoachAssignmentEndpointTests, CoachCommunicationEndpointTests, CoachCommunicationTemplateEndpointTests, CoachEditionEndpointTests, CoachInvitationEndpointTests, CoachProjectEndpointTests, CoachProjectSkillEndpointTests, CoachSkillTypeEndpointTests, CoachStudentEndpointTests, CoachSuggestionEndpointTests, CoachUserEndpointTests, CoachUserSkillEndpointTests
public abstract class TestFunctionProvider<T,I extends Serializable,R extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<T,I>> extends BaseTestPerformer<T,I,R>
Abstract class to help with testing the integration of endpoints. Implements basic tests. These tests need to be wrapped in a Test annotated function by the user. If a test is needed for a lot of entities, put it here so the code is not duplicated.

    • change_entity

      public abstract Map<String,String> change_entity(T startEntity)
      Change the entity to have a different field value. This will be used to test whether a patch request works.
      Parameters:
      startEntity - the entity we would like to change
      Returns:
      an map containing names of fields and new values

    • base_test_all_queried_assertions

      public void base_test_all_queried_assertions(String path, String paramName, String value) throws Exception
      Tests if a queried get request returns the searched element and no elements if a garbage search is performed.
      Parameters:
      path - the path the entity is served on, with '/' as prefix
      paramName - the parameter name that needs to be provided to the query.
      value - the value that will be searched for.
      Throws:
      Exception - throws exception if the request fails
